layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x52
  LayoutBlockFlow {test} at (0,0) size 800x52
    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,16) size 800x20
      LayoutInline {a} at (0,0) size 258x19 [color=#0000EE] [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 258x19
          text run at (0,0) width 258: "This link should have green background."
      LayoutText {#text} at (258,0) size 152x19
        text run at (258,0) width 152: " (Don't follow this link.)"
